titles.title: When We All Get To Heaven

authors.author: Eliza E. Hewitt Emily D. Wilson

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: When we all get to heaven, newline What a day of rejoicing that will be! newline When we all see Jesus, newline We'll sing and shout the victory.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Sing the wondrous love of Jesus, newline Sing His mercy and His grace; newline In the mansions bright and blessed, newline He'll prepare for us a place.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: While we walk the pilgrim pathway, newline Clouds will overspread the sky; newline But when traveling days are over, newline Not a shadow, not a sigh.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Let us then be true and faithful, newline Trusting, serving every day; newline Just one glimpse of Him in glory newline Will the toils of life repay.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Onward to the prize before us! newline Soon His beauty we'll behold; newline Soon the pearly gates will open, newline We shall tread the streets of gold.
